ResourceHeader.ResourceName: The Clarkson University Fluxgate Magnetometer Instrument.
ResourceHeader.Description: The Fluxgate Magnetometer instrument at the Clarkson University geomagnetic observatory.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark Moldwin, Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics and the Department of Earth and Space Sciences (University of California, Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA 90095-1567) for use of data from the Clarkson University Magnetometer instrument.

InformationURL.Name: Measure Magnetometer Array Temporary Web Site
InformationURL.Description: Temporary web site for the MEASURE magnetometer array. MEASURE is an acronym for Magnetometers along the Eastern Atlantic Seaboard for Undergraduate Research and Education. Measure is a meridional array of paired magnetometers along the east coast of the United States. Begun in 1998. The magnetometers were constructed by the UCLA magnetometer group.
